definitions.definition: Practical , concerned with making decisions and actions that are useful in practice , not just theory .
examples: The sturdy furniture in the student lounge was pragmatic , but unattractive.

definitions.definition: Philosophical ; dealing with causes, reasons, and effects, rather than with details and circumstances; said of literature .
Interfering in the affairs of others; officious ; meddlesome .

main_definition: Practical , concerned with making decisions and actions that are useful in practice , not just theory .
secondary_definitions: Philosophical ; dealing with causes, reasons, and effects, rather than with details and circumstances; said of literature .
( obsolete ) Interfering in the affairs of others; officious ; meddlesome .
